mapper.update:
UPDATE `quartz_task_informations` SET
`version` = #{set.version},
`task_no` = #{set.taskNo},
`task_name` = #{set.taskName},
`scheduler_rule` = #{set.schedulerRule},
`frozen_status` = #{set.frozenStatus},
`executor_no` = #{set.executorNo},
`frozen_time` = #{set.frozenTime},
`unfrozen_time` = #{set.unfrozenTime},
`create_time` = #{set.createTime},
`last_modify_time` = #{set.lastModifyTime},
`send_type` = #{set.sendType},
`url` = #{set.url},
`execute_paramter` = #{set.executeParamter},
`time_key` = #{set.timeKey},
`id` in
#{item} and
`id` >= #{where.idSt} and
`id` <= #{where.idEd} and
`version` in
#{item} and
`version` >= #{where.versionSt} and
`version` <= #{where.versionEd} and
`task_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Task_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Task_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`task_name` in
#{item} and
(
`Task_name` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Task_name` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`scheduler_rule` in
#{item} and
(
`Scheduler_rule` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Scheduler_rule` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`frozen_status` in
#{item} and
(
`Frozen_status` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Frozen_status` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`executor_no` in
#{item} and
(
`Executor_no` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Executor_no` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`frozen_time` in
#{item} and
`frozen_time` >= #{where.frozenTimeSt} and
`frozen_time` <= #{where.frozenTimeEd} and
`unfrozen_time` in
#{item} and
`unfrozen_time` >= #{where.unfrozenTimeSt} and
`unfrozen_time` <= #{where.unfrozenTimeEd} and
`create_time` in
#{item} and
`create_time` >= #{where.createTimeSt} and
`create_time` <= #{where.createTimeEd} and
`last_modify_time` in
#{item} and
`last_modify_time` >= #{where.lastModifyTimeSt} and
`last_modify_time` <= #{where.lastModifyTimeEd} and
`send_type` in
#{item} and
(
`Send_type` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Send_type` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`url` in
#{item} and
(
`Url` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Url` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`execute_paramter` in
#{item} and
(
`Execute_paramter` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Execute_paramter` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
`time_key` in
#{item} and
(
`Time_key` like concat('%',#{item},'%')
) and
(
`Time_key` like concat(#{item},'%')
) and
